definition: south/the southern part of the country/the South

sentences.english: Many southerners said all of the North was responsible for the raid.

sentences.english: So far, Ciba is still the South before the Spring Festival every year people around the food must be done.

sentences.english: However, when the snow continued to the South Sala , has become a disaster.

sentences.english: Her castle is in the south, in the country of the Quadlings.

sentences.english: Imagine, these lowdown Southern segregationists put the Northern Democrats down.

definition: north/the northern part a country/China north of the Yellow River
Northwest China (Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Ningxia, Xinjiang)

south of Changjiang or Yangtze river/south of the lower reaches of Changjiang/often refers to south Jiangsu, south Anhui and north Zhejiang provinces/a province during Qing times/in literature, refers to the sunny south/Gangnam (district in Seoul, South Korea)
the northern part of the country/the North
south/south side/southern part/to the south of
four seasons like spring/favorable climate throughout the year
north/north side/northern part/to the north of
